This is a {{translation|fusion technique|融合術|Yūgōjutsu}},<ref name="d4"/> which employs Water and Lightning Release. After releasing a [[Water Release: Water Formation Wall|large water wave]] from his mouth, Darui mixes lightning into it, instantly electrocuting the target caught in it.
